parameters:
\n<Udo>\F[\V[2]]\FF[\V[4]]\AA[FF](The computers inside the mansion are connected to the
intranet. If you enter the ID and password, you
can watch the secret collection.)

\n<Udo>\F[\V[2]]\FF[\V[4]]\AA[FF](By the way... the whole performance using the laptop
was an idea suggested by a girl named Momo.)

\n<Udo>\F[\V[2]]\FF[\V[4]]\AA[FF](The purchase order is a mess... Who was the last dog
to clean up here? They're going to be punished...
Did someone do this on purpose?)

\n<Udo>\F[\V[2]]\FF[\V[4]]\AA[FF](......Hm? It's locked. Well... I don't have any memories of
locking it, so it probably doesn't have anything
important inside.)

\n<Udo>\F[\V[2]]\FF[\V[4]]\AA[FF](It smells musty... I haven't used this bed, should I
get rid of it...)

\n<Udo>\F[\V[2]]\FF[\V[4]]\AA[FF](It smells musty... I haven't used this bed, should I
get rid of it...)
